articles.title: PSA: Scammers are posing as Google to takeover your Gmail account - Android Authority
articles.description: No, Google is not calling or emailing you. It's scammers that are posing as the tech giant to takeover your Gmail accounts.
articles.content:
• AI technology is enabling increasingly sophisticated scams, including a Gmail takeover scheme where scammers impersonate Google.

articles.title: Artificial Intelligence Raises Ukrainian Drone Kill Rates to 80% - Kyiv Post
articles.description: Ukraine has been called the “test lab for the future of war” nowhere more so than in the development of the technology and military use of drones, with a million UAVs to be fielded this year.
